headline: NRG Energy Controls Both Power Generation and Distribution as AI Data Centers Reshape the Grid
summary: NRG Energy (NYSE:NRG) dropped 4.7% over the past week while the S&P 500 slipped just 0.5%. Year to date, NRG is down 5.1% versus the market’s 1% gain. So why does Wall Street keep betting on this utility? The answer isn’t defensive positioning. It’s infrastructure. The AI Power Supercycle Thesis NRG sits at the intersection ... headline: Is It Too Late To Reconsider Constellation Energy (CEG) After Its Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: If you are wondering whether Constellation Energy stock is still priced attractively after its big run over recent years, this article walks through what the current share price might be implying about value. The stock last closed at US$287.35, with a 7 day return of 15.8% decline, a 30 day return of 20.5% decline, a year to date return of 21.5% decline, and a 1 year return of 16.5% decline, set against a 3 year return of about 2.4x. Recent price moves sit alongside an ongoing investor focus...
